issue.title: X2 battery lasts only 20 minutes? (Simple Tunnel 02)

content.raw:
OK, yes in this environment even 5 minutes is too much \(but AWS runs always 60 minutes, maybe it could be shorter for these tests?\). If it is expected and in final “Tunnel Circuit” environment it will be 60 minutes, no problem then. :slight_smile: 

BTW recharging is possible via return to the base station? \(for drones\)
content.html:
OK, yes in this environment even 5 minutes is too much (but AWS runs always 60 minutes, maybe it could be shorter for these tests?). If it is expected and in final “Tunnel Circuit” environment it will be 60 minutes, no problem then.
